definitions.definition: According to the required or usual ceremonies , formalities , or rituals ; specifically ( Christianity , obsolete ) , to ceremonial laws in the Bible .
Of a person : fond of ceremony or ritual, or of observing strict etiquette or formality ; punctilious .
Synonym of ceremonial ( “ of, relating to, consisting of, or used in a ceremony or rite ” ) ; formal , ritual .

main_definition: According to the required or usual ceremonies , formalities , or rituals ; specifically ( Christianity , obsolete ) , to ceremonial laws in the Bible .
secondary_definitions: Of a person : fond of ceremony or ritual, or of observing strict etiquette or formality ; punctilious .
Synonym of ceremonial ( “ of, relating to, consisting of, or used in a ceremony or rite ” ) ; formal , ritual .
